name: OnTheDotWomanFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Start each day with 4 minutes of rich, original content celebrating the advancement of women. By profiling relatable female role models and providing relevant statistics that women need to know to advance themselves in business and life, On The Dot is your go-to resource to start your day off right. Professionally recorded audio for your listening pleasure. For past episodes go to onthedotwoman.com. Follow us on social media @onthedotwoman.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
